data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 2, Pohang Steelers's Stanislav Iljutcenko gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Pohang Steelers territory.
In the minute 3, Pohang Steelers pushes forward through Stanislav Iljutcenko, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Jeonbuk.
In the minute 5, Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Pohang Steelers's Song Min-kyu gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Jeonbuk defender.
Song Min-kyu for Pohang Steelers gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the home team in Jeonju.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pohang Steelers drives forward and Song Min-kyu gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 9, Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Jeonbuk needs to be cautious. Pohang Steelers have an attacking throw-in.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Jeonbuk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Jeonbuk.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Jeonbuk in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Kim Jin-su hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Jeonbuk.
Ball safe as Pohang Steelers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Kim Woo-sung signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Jeonbuk's half.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 16, Kim Woo-sung awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Pohang Steelers's Manuel Palacios breaks free at Jeonju World Cup Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 17, Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half?
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 21, Pohang Steelers's Stanislav Iljutcenko is on target but unsuccessful.
Jeonbuk's Murilo misses with an attempt on goal.
Kim Woo-sung awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Kim Woo-sung awards the away team a throw-in.
Jeonbuk have a dangerous throw-in.
Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Kim Woo-sung signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
In Jeonju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 30, Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Jeonbuk.
Attention is being given to Jeonbuk’s Choi Bo-kyung and play has been suspended briefly.
He's off! Manuel Palacios is shown a red card.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Jeonbuk are pushing forward but Kim Jin-su's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Jeonju.
In the minute 35, Jeonbuk’s Choi Bo-kyung is on his feet again at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
Throw-in high up the field for Jeonbuk in Jeonju.
In the minute 37, Jeonbuk push forward at Jeonju World Cup Stadium and Lee Seung-ki gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Pohang Steelers defence.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half?
In Jeonju Jeonbuk drive forward through Kim Bo-kyung. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 40, Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Pohang Steelers territory.
Free kick Jeonbuk.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Han Kyo-won for Jeonbuk drives towards goal at Jeonju World Cup Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 43, Lee Seung-ki of Jeonbuk gets in a strike, but is off target.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
The away team replace Kwon Wan-kyu with Jeon Min-kwang.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Pohang Steelers territory.
Kim Woo-sung awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Kim Woo-sung will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Can Jeonbuk capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pohang Steelers's half?
Jeonbuk attack but Murilo's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Ball safe as Pohang Steelers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Jeonju.
Kim Woo-sung has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Jeonbuk.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
The home team have replaced Jo Gue-sung with Gustavo. This is the first substitution made today by Jose Morais.
In the minute 47, Kim Woo-sung signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Jeonbuk's half?
In the minute 50, Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Jeonbuk's half.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in the half of Jeonbuk.
In the minute 52, Jeon Min-kwang (Pohang Steelers) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Kim Woo-sung awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Song Min-kyu scores to make it 0-1 at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 55, Lee Kwang-hyeok with an assist there.
Kim Woo-sung signals a throw-in for Jeonbuk, close to Pohang Steelers's area.
Jeonbuk's Lee Seung-ki gets in a shot on goal at Jeonju World Cup Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, In Jeonju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jeonbuk make their second substitution with Modou Barrow replacing Murilo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Jeonju.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 61, Jeonbuk drive upfield and Lee Seung-ki gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Pohang Steelers defender.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Son Jun-ho.
That's a fine assist from Modou Barrow.
In the minute 63, In Jeonju Jeonbuk attack through Lee Seung-ki. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 64, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Son Jun-ho of Jeonbuk gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In Jeonju, Son Jun-ho (Jeonbuk) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Jeonju.
In the minute 68, Pohang Steelers's Kang Hyeon-mu has been booked in Jeonju.
Jeonbuk surge into the attack at Jeonju World Cup Stadium but Gustavo’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 69, Shim Dong-un is replacing Song Min-kyu for Pohang Steelers at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Kim Bo-kyung is on target to give Jeonbuk a 2-1 advantage.
Gustavo instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Jeonbuk are pushing forward but Modou Barrow's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 75, Kim Woo-sung awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
Can Pohang Steelers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Jeonbuk's half?
In the minute 78, Jeonbuk have a goal kick.
Jeonbuk are coming forward and Lee Seung-ki gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Jeonju.
In the minute 80, Gustavo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Jeonbuk.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Jeonbuk's Lee Seung-ki misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 80, Kim Woo-sung awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
Kim Woo-sung awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 83, At Jeonju World Cup Stadium, Pohang Steelers are penalized for being offside.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Jeonju to check on Lee Seung-mo, who is grimacing with pain.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Son Jun-ho.
Jeonbuk's Son Jun-ho looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 85, The away team has substituted Lee Seung-mo with Aleksandar Palocevic. Gi Dong Kim is thus making his third change.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 86, Kim Jin-su of Jeonbuk gets in a strike, but is off target.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 87, At Jeonju World Cup Stadium, Stanislav Iljutcenko has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Jeonbuk in Jeonju.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Kim Jin-su is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Kim Jin-su has recovered and rejoins the match in Jeonju.
Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Gustavo (Jeonbuk) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
Lee Si-hyun is on a sub for Kim Bo-kyung for Jeonbuk.
